name: Green Tea Extract
description:
Promotes Fat Loss & Provides Antioxidant Support!

Green Tea is widely considered an A+ antioxidant due to its high concentration of polyphenols, which are compounds that help destroy potentially harmful free radicals. Green tea extract may also help support normal, healthy immune function.

DreAesthetics Green Tea Extract may promote fat loss and support weight management by increasing energy expenditure! By increasing your overall metabolic rate, green tea can be used in combination with exercise to assist your fat-loss physique goals. Green tea extracts also contain a small amount of natural caffeine, which can help increase energy.*
 
9 BENEFITS 

1. Assists Weight Loss
The ECGC contained in green tea extract limits the negative effects of a fatty diet and smoking. Consumption of green tea extract enhances the process of thermogenesis and increases the rate of metabolism of fat, without increasing the heart rate. Hence, consuming green tea extract can help you lose weight without jitteriness or feelings of anxiety. When you drink the beverage, it makes you feel full and discourages you from eating. The extract also helps your body burn more calories. All these factors make green tea an essential supplement in your weight loss program.
2. Prevents Tooth Decay
Green tea extract has the ability to destroy plaque-causing bacteria and helps prevent tooth decay.
3. Lowers Cholesterol and Blood Pressure
Green tea extract helps to lower the LDL (bad) cholesterol that’s responsible for clotting of blood. The extract helps prevent strokes and heart attacks. It promotes the production of HDL (good) cholesterol that removes the plaque in the arteries and keeps them elastic. This lowers your risks of suffering from heart disease. Persons suffering from hypertension also benefit by consuming green tea extract, because it lowers blood pressure.
4. Fights Cancer
Green tea extract is rich in antioxidants, such as ECGC, that kill cancer cells and prevent their growth without harming healthy tissue. Consumption of this extract is especially beneficial to patients suffering from breast, lung, skin, liver, bladder, pancreatic, stomach or prostate cancer.
5. Prevents Inflammation
Arthritic patients find that consuming green tea extract decreases the pain in their joints, because it prevents inflammation which in turn decreases wear and tear of the joints. The extract also slows the breakdown of cartilage and provides relief to patients suffering from arthritis.
6. Controls Blood Sugar Levels
The polyphenols present in green tea extract reduce the amount of amylase that’s produced by the body. Amylase is the enzyme that converts starch into sugar. Consuming green tea helps to decrease blood sugar levels and thus helps keep diabetes under control.
7. Prevents Liver Disease
Green tea protects the liver from toxins and thus helps prevent liver disease.
8. Slows the Aging Process
The antioxidants present in green tea extract are responsible for slowing down the aging process of the body. This helps you look younger.
9. Fights Infection
Green tea extract is antibacterial and antiviral, and helps the body fight respiratory and digestive infections such as influenza and diarrhea.
Green tea extract also helps increase the rate of metabolism of carbohydrates, reduces stress, cures headaches, improves digestion, boosts the immune system and increases your life expectancy.

name: BCAA
description:
BRANCH CHAIN AMINO ACIDS
Dieting down will get you shredded, but it might also shave some size from your biceps. BCAAs can help protect your muscles against the catabolic effects of dieting!

Everybody wants a lean, muscular physique. Like anything worth having, wanting it isn't enough. You have to commit to a rigorous diet and training program that will tax your strength mentally as well as physically. To help you satisfy both of these demands, DreAesthetics Essential Amino Acids combines a powerful ratio of rapidly absorbed free-form amino acids with natural energizers and N.O. boosting ingredients to help you reach your next level - including muscle-building BCAAs and arginine to help support intense, vascular pumps.* At 10 calories per serving, it'll make a big impression without denting your diet. Mix up anytime you want to dial up mental focus, physical energy N.O. production and recovery support.*

DreAesthetics - BCAA


Free Form Amino Acids for Rapid Uptake*
Essential Amino Acids including BCAAs
Supports Recovery Before, During & After Exercise*
Train Longer & Harder with beta-Alanine*
Natural Energizers*
Supports Nitric Oxide Synthesis*
0 Grams of Sugar per Serving
Mixes Easily

name: ALCAR
description:
Acetyl L-Carnitine is a natural form of carnitine present in the human body, especially the muscles, brain and testicles. Like carnitine, acetyl-l-carnitine is involved in a wide variety of essential metabolic processes in the body, but a key difference is that the acetylated form of carnitine can penetrate the blood brain barrier. In the brain, acetyl-l-carnitine can help boost dopaminergic function resulting in better focus and concentration. 

Scientifically designed to maximize the utilization of fatty acids as an energy source, helping to reduce your body's tendency to store fat and working to improve muscular definition.

name: Anabolic Mass
description:
DreAesthetics HARD GAINER is a Lean Muscle-Building, Hard-Gainer Protein for Those Serious about Gaining Size.
- Massive 3-to-1 Carbohydrate-to-Protein Ratio!
- Fast-Acting Carb-Complex to Promote Muscle Glycogen and Protein Synthesis.
- Formulated to Support Accelerated Post Workout Recovery and Lean Muscle Gains.
- Purest Source of Protein from the Highest Bioavailable and Undenatured 100% Pure Whey.
- No Aspartame, No Added Sugar.
- No Cheap Fillers, Oils, Salt, Artificial Colours or Flavours.
- Clean Formulation to Maximize Purity – Everything You Need, Nothing That You Don’t!

Quality – Less is More
We only use ingredients that are beneficial to your body as ‘Less is More’ when it comes to quality. 
- Cheap Fillers
- Creamers
- Genetically Modified Oils or Fats
- Aspartame
- Sugar
- Salt
- Artificial Colours or Flavours

When to Consume?
Morning
DreAesthetics HARD GAINER consumed first thing in the morning can help return your body to an anabolic state from the overnight fast during sleep.

After Exercise
HARD GAINER has been formulated to support accelerated post workout recovery and lean muscle gains. Consume straight after exercise to replenish muscle glycogen, promote protein synthesis, and reduce protein degradation.

Between Meals
HARD GAINER is ideal between meals to maintain an anabolic state and add the carbohydrates you need to grow.

Before Bed
HARD GAINER is suitable at night before bed to help maintain an anabolic state during sleep as your body rests and repairs.

name: Premium Isolate
description:
Whey Protein Isolates

Whey Protein Isolate (WPI) is manufactured by ion exchange (IX) and proprietary ultra-filtration techniques, generating un-denatured, soluble whey. In particular, and retains all the important peptides found in WPC, while delivering an extremely high level of protein (91%) with virtually no fat, lactose or carbohydrates.

Due to its very low carbohydrate, lactose & fat levels WPI is the ideal protein for any athlete want to improve recovery or pack on lean muscle without adding any unwanted fat. People following weight management /calorie controlled diets or anyone who wants to increase their daily protein intake find WPI to be a perfect low calorie option.

♦ Delivers aminos for faster muscle growth and strength gains
♦ Assists and increases muscle repair
♦ Improves glycogen replenishment and nitrogen retention
♦ Highest Protein Digestibility (PDCAAS) and protein efficiency ratio (PER) of all proteins
♦ Less than 1% Carbs and Fats
♦ Low lactose, Low Cholesterol
♦ Instantised – Easy mixing
♦ Protein Digestibility (PDCAAS) score of 1.14
♦ Biological Value (BV) of 104
♦ Protein Efficiency Ratio (PER) of 3.4

name: Sleeveless Hoodie
description: The muscle hoodie is a stylish contoured & tapered fit - promoting comfort for every training session and ensuring you’ll look & feel your best! Can be worn to train in, jogging or just casually!
